text: Florencio Olvera Ochoa (October 12, 1933 – December 20, 2020) was a Mexican Bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Cuernavaca from 2002 to 2009. Olvera was born in Tequisquiapan, Mexico. He became a priest in Querétaro in 1958. He was made bishop of Tabasco in 1992 and bishop of Cuernavaca in 2002. On July 10, 2009 Pope Benedict XVI accepted his resignation. Olvera Ochoa died on December 20, 2020 at the age of 87.Fallece Florencio Olvera Ochoa, ex obispo de Tabasco ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Tabasco Category:People from Querétaro
title: Florencio Olvera Ochoa
